networkplugin.name: Mojiva
networkplugin.info_content:
Network Info

The team from Mojiva makes your job easier by developing unique, cutting-edge mobile advertising campaigns and monetization strategies for agencies, brand advertisers and publishers around the world. Mojiva provides a monthly reach of over 1 billion unique devices worldwide, with 270 million of those devices coming from the US.

Ad Formats

Mojiva supports both Banner Ads, Text Ads and Rich Media Ads.

Best Countries

USA
